caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. MELVIN

opinion.opinion_text:
On order of the Court, the delayed application for leave to appeal from the February 5, 1999, decision of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
Court of Appeals No. 203773.
